title: Bloomberg's Tynan on VW and the Future of Diesel in Cars(Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Tynan on VW and the Future of Diesel in Cars(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. Guest: Kevin Tynan, Senior Auto analyst for Bloomberg Intelligence, on VW earnings, the future of diesel in cars, and a preview of Tesla's shareholder meeting.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
